p: It has been suggested that there exists protective effects of curcumin against genetic damage as well as against the side-effects induced by 131I administration in terms of micronuclei frequency in human lymphocytes [ 126]. Radioprotective effects of C. longa extract were studied in rats against Î³-irradiation, pre- and post-treatment the extract was found to be effective in modulating the levels of inflammatory cytokines, trace elements and the protein levels of SOD-1 and PRDX-1. Thus, modulation of antioxidant enzymes was held responsible for conferring radioprotection by C. longa extract [ 127].
